definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence

sentences.english: His punishment of death was commuted to life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 他被从死刑减为无期徒刑。

sentences.english: He has said she faces a possible life sentence.
sentences.chinese: 维曾表示，田文华可能会被判无期徒刑。

sentences.english: Typically gw gold, such sentences are commuted to life in prison.
sentences.chinese: 通常情况下，这种判决都会减刑为无期徒刑。

sentences.english: Jean got life imprisonment for killing the policeman.
sentences.chinese: 简因杀害那个警察被判处无期徒刑。

sentences.english: The court doomed the accused to life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判决被告无期徒刑。

sentences.english: His punishment was commuted from life imprisonment to twenty-five years' imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 他的无期徒刑减轻为二十五年徒刑。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court automatically reviews life imprisonment and death sentences.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院自动审查无期徒刑和死刑。

sentences.english: If the circumstances are especially serious, the offender shall be sentenced to life imprisonment, and concurrently be sentenced to confiscation of property.
sentences.chinese: 情节特别严重的，处无期徒刑，并处没收财产。

sentences.english: On August 21 this year, Wang was sentenced to life in prison for fraud.
sentences.chinese: 今年8月，王细牛因欺诈罪被判无期徒刑。

sentences.english: Two other men who sold tainted protein powder, Zhang Yanzhang and Xue Jianzhong, were sentenced to prison for life, the state-run news agency, Xinhua, reported.
sentences.chinese: 出售有毒蛋白粉的张艳章和薛建忠被判无期徒刑。

sentences.english: The charge of throwing corrosive liquid with an intent to injure carries a maximum life sentence.
sentences.chinese: 意图淋泼腐蚀性液体，造成伤害罪最高可判无期徒刑。

sentences.english: His punishment has been commuted from death to life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 他的刑罚已从死刑减为无期徒刑。

sentences.english: If the circumstances are serious, the offender shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than ten years or life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 情节严重的，处十年以上有期徒刑或者无期徒刑。

sentences.english: The principal criminal was sentenced to life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 这个主犯被判无期徒刑。

sentences.english: I think life sentence is crueler than death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得无期徒刑比死刑更残酷。

sentences.english: If she shows good behavior, her sentence will be commuted to life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 如果表现良好，她的死缓将被减成无期徒刑。

definition: limited term of imprisonment (i.e. anything less than life imprisonment)
deferred death sentence/commuted death sentence with forced labor and judicial review after two years (PRC) (legal)
to defer/to put off (until later)/to postpone
to repeatedly commit an offense/repeat offender/habitual criminal/recidivist/recidivism
to assess punishment/to determine the sentence (on a criminal)
to imprison/to jail/to take into custody
